bullseye.summary: Bullseye layouts center content vertically and horizontally.

flex.summary: Flex layouts create consistently spaced custom layouts that are responsive to other layouts and PatternFly components.

gallery.summary: Gallery layouts arrange content in a responsive grid of uniform rows and columns.

grid.summary: Grid layouts arrange content on a fixed-size 12 column grid.

level.summary: Level layouts evenly distribute content horizontally.

split.summary: Split layouts distribute multiple items horizontally, which adapt to viewport resizing.

stack.summary: Stack layouts distribute multiple items vertically, which adapt to the available space of a container.
